forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and a few clouds. High 13C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny. High 56F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
